item.title: [DISTRELEC-3220] OCI/Ariba Conversion-Tracking
item.description: Requested: Transmitting the conversion-values to Webtrekk at the time as the values are transmitted via the OCI- and Ariba-environment to the according ERP-system of the customers. Technically spoken a Webtrekk function call via event-handler (onclick) has to be a generated. Detailed requirements are specified in the attached Spec-file (Distrelec_Webtrekk_OCI-Ariba-Spec_new-Webshop_MDI_I-1.0_2014-02-13.doc).

comments.comment: Todo: Make an estimation. Everything must be transmitted via JS.

My estimation is below. I assign this ticket to Dishan so he can review the Backend estimation.

Frontend

  • Add new Tracking Function to Webtrekk JS 0.5 d
  • Process JSON Data and fire Tracking Event 1.0 d
  • Testing 0.5 d

Backend

  • Provide Values: OCI / Ariba, orderID 0.25 d
  • Change Page Params 10 and 9 to “oci / ariba” and “ct” 0.25 d
  • Provide all Product currently in the Cart via Ajax or as JSON inside the Page for the Frontend 1.0 d
  • Testing 0.5 d

• We cannot provide an orderID, since the OCI and Ariba customers do not place their order in our shop (hybris), it goes directly to the erp.
  • Change Page Params 10 and 9 to “oci / ariba” and “ct” 0.25 d - OK
  • Provide all Product currently in the Cart via Ajax or as JSON inside the Page for the Frontend 1.0 d - OK
  • Testing 0.5 d - OK

The orderID can be neglected in this case.

For Ariba please use the value 'arb' as specified in the WT-Spec.

Thx Mark

item.title: [DISTRELEC-3213] Facet Search Improvement: Selection of facets with one result should not jump to detail page
item.description:
Current behavior:

  • if the user selects a facet for which there is exactly one result, the detail page of the resulting product is opened directly.
  • Example: select "1.5 mOhm" on http://www.distrelec.at/search?q=widerstand
  • This is cumbersome, because most often the user would like to select a number of facets, but after the first one he already force-left the search page.
  • (however this behavior is well intended and appreciated when an actual keyword search only returns one single product)

Improvement:

  • Leave the behavior as it is for the keyword search, BUT
  • Don't open the detail page if only one result remains after a facet was applied. Instead show the result list with only the one remaining result.
item.summary: Facet Search Improvement: Selection of facets with one result should not jump to detail page

comments.comment:
Is mostly backend work, because the backend needs to adjust the url.
